name: 陳文輝
objective: The goal of this course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics, ubiquitous computing, and cover the terminology, design considerations and safety assessment of self-driving by reading and discussing recent literature.
schedule:
Week1. Course Introduction
Week2-3. Ubiquitous Computing
Week4-5: Smart Environments
Week6-7: Smart Technology
Week8-9: Midterm Presentation
Week10-11: Sensor-based Activity RecognitionSelf-Driving Cars
Week12-13: Sensor Fusion in Autonomous Vehicles
Week14-15. Object Detection in Autonomous Vehicles
Week16. Business Visit (Living 3.0)
Week17-18. Project Presentations
scorePolicy:
1. Participation and Assignments: 50%
2.Midterm  Presentation 25%
3. Final Presentations 25%
materials:
Lecture Notes & Selected Readings
